Text: Re New Incident Need new userid and passwordforgot them both KMMCKMDear Mr Shapiro Thank you for your email message Per your request below you will find your username and password Please keep in mind that usernames and password are case sensitive Username enershapir Password password Due to security reasons we recommend that you change your password after the initial logon This will ensure that only you can access your account To change your password follow these steps Click the word Tools on the toolbar Click Change Save or Remove My Password First enter your existing password in the box provided You must enter this before you select a new password Next enter your password Passwords can include from to letters or numbers with no spaces Passwords are case sensitive Enter the same new password again The two passwords must match Click Submit These Your new password will become effective immediately Thank you for allowing Factiva to serve your business information needs In order to help us evaluate our support services to ensure we are meeting your needs we invite you to fill out a short survey regarding your experience with the Factiva Customer Service department The survey is located at surveyCsqaspnodecontactlink on the Web and will only take a few minutes to complete We are dedicated to providing you with the products you want and the support you need to use those products most effectively Thank you for taking the time to assist us in ensuring we are meeting these goals Regards Marvin Daniels Customer Service Contact Center Factiva A Dow Jones Reuters Company Factiva Global Customer Service Now X Around the world around the clock support Use our Call Me Form to send us your inquiry at any time from any time zone wwwfactivacomcustomerservice Original
